thread.title: IT Partners Named to 2015 Washington Technology Fast 50
thread.title_full: IT Partners Named to 2015 Washington Technology Fast 50 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: IT Partners Named to 2015 Washington Technology Fast 50
text:
The SAP consulting firm is among the fastest growing small business contractors in the government market.
(PRWEB) September 09, 2015
IT Partners, a Women Owned Small Business that delivers SAP technology services and solutions to the federal government, proudly announces that it has been named to Washington Technology’s Fast 50 list.
The Fast 50 list represents the fastest growing small businesses in the government contracting market. Winners are chosen based on their five-year annual compound growth rate. This includes prime and subcontracting revenue at the federal, state, and local levels. This is IT Partner’s first appearance on the list, coming in at No. 29 .
“We are pleased to be on this list! Our team continues to grow each year and effectively responds to this demanding market with new and innovative solutions,” said President, Anthony Cecchini. “This is a big win for the IT Partners' team and we could not be more proud.”
To read more about the FAST 50 visit the 2015 Washington Technology Fast 50 List
About IT Partners Inc.:
IT Partners Inc. is a SAP consulting firm headquartered in the Greater Pittsburgh area. As one of the leading small business, women-owned SAP companies in the USA, ITP offers comprehensive planning, ERP development expertise, resource allocation, implementation and upgrade assistance and training to companies using SAP in the Eastern United States through on-site and remote access consulting. IT Partners, Inc. specializes in IT consulting services including: onsite SAP consulting, remote SAP consulting, SAP training development, SAP application development, SAP application integration, and SAP BW/BOBJ Analytics including SAP HANA. http://www.itpsap.com
 //www.prweb.com/releases/IT-Partners/Fast-50/prweb12942352.htm
